Content: President Maithripala Sirisena has expressed his condolences to the family members of the war hero Dinesh Jayawickrama who was killed in an explosion while on UN peacekeeping mission in Mali. The President who went to the residence of late Major H W Dinesh Jayawickrama at Pulasthi-pura in Polonnaruwa expressed his condolences to his parents and relatives. Parliamentarian Mahinda Samarasinghe accompanied the President. The remains of the late Major Jayawickrama are scheduled to be brought to the country on Monday.
